medical_history.chief_complaint: Patient presented with multiple cutaneous myxomas, cardiac myxomas, and spotty pigmentation.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had a history of cardiac myxoma at age 14 and cutaneous myxoma at age 30. Recently, he developed two new cardiac myxomas, leading to admission.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of cardiac myxoma of the right ventricle removed surgically at age 14 and acute cutaneous myxoma at age 30.
medical_history.family_history: Both parents and two brothers tested negative for the PRKAR1A mutation, indicating no family history of Carney complex.
